body_content.explanation: the state of being happy or satisfied with what you have and not wanting more:
examples: Often, the only thing that gives a person an air of self-content is the right state of mind.
This was the only thing that gave her any hope of self-content.

body_content.explanation: the state of being very pleased with yourself and showing no criticism of yourself:
examples: He always looked in the mirror with perfect self-content.
The look of smug self-content was still on his face.
